title: Here’s What Consumers Plan to Buy on Labor Day Weekend
dc:creator: Jeremy Jones
description:
Labor Day sales typically focus on big ticket items...But as inflation has slashed discretionary spending, a RetailMeNot survey of more than 1,000 shoppers shows most plan to focus on the essentials this year...59% of respondents will be looking for deals during the holiday weekend and intend to spend an average of $178. In addition, 54% of shoppers said they’ll buy food and drinks, and 42% are looking to pick up clothing.

The post Here’s What Consumers Plan to Buy on Labor Day Weekend appeared first on Ziff Davis.
